Tucson lies calmly and nodds to Stanton as he turns his head over to Rodimu=
s. Although he could not see him, he could sense his pressense. He then tur=
ns his head back to lie back and as he does so, he closes his eyes, to reac=
h deep down into that special place in his spark, the one he could feel for=
 Talon, and everyone else, the one that lead him back to Rodimus instead of=
 abandoning him in the dark insectile pit.  It may not have been the Matrix=
, but it was something of his own accord.   Yet, he takes a moment to slip =
back into a trance like state, to consult the matrix power within him.

" P=
rimus, I could not leave Rodimus abandoned in the dark pits of the Black Fo=
rtress, even though he had told me to do so.  It is not his time, and I wil=
l not see him die needlessly.  Give me the strength to  reach Rodimus, and =
bring him back into the light, where he belongs.  I know I can do this, I h=
ave to do this, in your honor I will never give up on my bretheren."

Outsi=
de the observation room, Night Shift stands close to Silverbolt, with the s=
ame kind of hope and faith as his comrade.

" You're right Silverbolt, we c=
an do this, we have what it takes ta overcome the worst and give it our bes=
t.  We've got somethn' Hydras will never have, somethn' we got gon' on righ=
t here, and somethn' that ain't shot out of some fancy plasma weapon."

Str=
aight Shot now consoles Noctorro.

" You're worried that Tucson might not c=
ome out of it, I can't blame you for being worried because this is a really=
 risky step he's taking.  But I can tell ya that, Night Shift's right. We g=
ot something that beats the most powerful weapon in the universe, and Hydra=
s doesn't have it.  It's something we all share, something deep down inside=
 us.  And unless you know what compassion is, you'll never have that specia=
l power."

She gently puts a hand on Noctoro's leg.

You got that special p=
ower, I know you do.  He'll make it, you'll see, Tucson Prime will make it.=


Rat Trap keeps his hopes up and eyes on what happens inside the room.

" =
We just gotta hold onta hope guys, we just gotta.  I know I will. "

Straig=
ht Shot ponders things for a moment.  She could feel something deep down in=
side of her, and she felt that she needed to share that with others.  So, s=
he gives her hand to Perceptor at first, and another to Rat Trap, who smile=
s back.  He then turns and gives Night Shift his hand, as Night Shift smile=
s, and then gives Silverbolt his.

" I think I know where she's gon' with t=
his..  We gotta pull tagether guys.  Our hope in our leader is what's gonna=
 pull him through. After all, didn't someone say till all are one at some p=
oint or other?  Well, this is where we get ta test that out.  Who's with us=
?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrot=

harm comes to me, then nothing will be held against any of you but myself. =
I will take full blame for what happens. In Primus's speed my friends, in P=
rimus's speed. Good will prevail, and the light will remain forever lit. No=
w, let's do this before we lose him."

l."

 shall pull you out."

> Silverbolt continued to watch the operation=
 through the glass, his
> face lightly reflected in the glass was thoughtfu=
l as his optics took
> in the scene. "We will be victorious, because have t=
o be." he said as
> his own hand clamped down. He was a soldier, a knight, =
who was ready
> to do battle, and yet there was nothing to battle. He felt =
helpless.

es all we

eme
> he has in mind." He smiled, "But we shall be ready for him, with all
=

s being connected, "We
